section.6: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa'eed bin Jubair said:"I was with Ibn 'Umar when he departed from 'Arafah. When he came to Jam' (Al-Muzdalifah), he combined Maghrib and 'Isha', and when he finished he said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) did similar to this in this place
